Hoover Hardwood Flooring Services is your go-to company for anything related to wood floors. We have years of experience with hardwood installation, refinishing, restoration, and repairs.  You will be so "floored" by our commitment to excellence, our work ethic, and our Southern charm, you'll (hopefully) recommend us to everyone you know!    Wood Flooring is a big investment that will transform the look and feel of your home or business.  It provides an elegant and classic look to any space and it will last for a lifetime if cared for properly.  Hardwoods are also very convenient when it comes to cleaning.  Spills wipe right up, there's no need to rent a steam cleaning machine, and as long as you don't let liquid sit on your floors for long periods of time, no disgusting stains!  When you add up all of the benefits of hardwood floors and consider how long they will last, this far outweighs the cost of wood flooring installation.    Because of the way wood floors are manufactured, when they become worn from years of foot traffic, sharp objects, and pet claws, it is a very simple process to sand them down and refinish them.  Hoover Hardwood Flooring Services has performed wood floor refinishing services for a large amount of residents and business owners in the Birmingham metro area. We use top of the line equipment and take every step necessary to ensure it is done quickly and efficiently in order to minimize the interruption to your daily life.    We are also very skilled at any type of hardwood floor repair work you may need.  Broken boards, water damage, bowing and buckling are all common issues that we deal with regularly.  Moisture and humidity play a huge role in the condition of hardwood flooring.  Wood swells and contracts with extreme changes in temperature or humidity, and if a floor is not installed correctly, you will be faced with serious issues.  Our flooring contractors have seen it all when it comes to damaged flooring, so you can be confident knowing that we will help resolve any issue you may have.    We are passionate about wood floors and have dedicated our lives to running a business around our passion.  We spend quite a bit of time planning out your project in order to make sure everything goes smoothly and exceeds your expectations.  We will spend as much time as you need helping you select the perfect wood type, stain color, and board size to transform your space into the one of your dreams.  If you already have wood flooring, we will be sure to restore and revitalize it back to its original glory.  Our hardwood floor refinishing services have often resulted in clients thinking we completely replaced their floors.  We know all there is to know about wood floors, so don't be surprised if our crew takes it upon themselves to educate you on everything they know about hardwoods.  From the proper cleaning products to what you should or shouldn't let come in contact with your floors, you too will be a pro when it comes to hardwoods.    We are proud to carry on the tradition that begun centuries ago when the first hardwood floors were installed.  So many households installed carpet over their hardwoods during the 1950s because that was the trend, but the majority of those households have pulled up the carpets in the past 10 years or so to find beautiful wood floors in great condition.
